title: Special elections offer Democrats glimmer of hope: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: Democrats have had a rough go since Donald Trump's return to Washington, but some think 2025 off-year and special elections can provide hope.

title: Musk gives away two $1 million checks to Wisconsin voters
shortDescription: Elon Musk handed out million-dollar checks to two voters in Wisconsin and promised smaller payments to others who help elect a conservative candidate to the state's top court.

title: Trump says he's 'not joking' about possibly running for a third term
shortDescription: The U.S. Constitution bars people from serving more than two terms as president.

title: 'Simply not true': Atlantic editor hits Trump admin claims over leaked chat
shortDescription: National Security Advisor Mike Waltz has said he's never met or talked to journalist Jeffrey Goldberg.

title: Trump said he was 'pissed off' after Putin criticized Zelenskyy's credibility
shortDescription: Trump said Putin knows he is angry with him, but noted “the anger dissipates quickly ... if he does the right thing.”

title: Trump says 'there will be bombing' if Iran doesn't make nuclear deal
shortDescription: Donald Trump threatened Iran with bombings and secondary tariffs if Tehran did not come to an agreement with Washington over its nuclear program.

title: Trump says he 'couldn't care less' if tariffs raise some car prices: Takeaways
shortDescription: The president told NBC News he 'couldn't care less' if tariffs raise some auto costs. He also addressed the shocking Signal chat leak and obtaining Greenland.

title: Who's on the ballot – and what's at stake – in the 2025 elections?
shortDescription: Starting with a contentious Wisconsin court race, 2025 has a handful of key elections that could shape both parties' path forward.

title: Trump says U.S. will 'get Greenland,' doesn't rule out military force
shortDescription: President Donald Trump did not rule out military force to acquire Greenland in an interview as the Danish territory continued to rebuff his advances.

title: Despite uphill battle, Dems roll out bills to address disparities
shortDescription: Democrats know there's little chance the GOP-controlled Congress will pass bills to combat disparities, but pledge to keep pushing.

title: Muslim Americans fear leaving country as Trump travel ban looms
shortDescription: The Trump administration is considering prohibiting or limiting travelers from more than 40 countries from entering the U.S.

title: Trump plans a sweeping round of new tariffs this week: What to know
shortDescription: The president has circled April 2 as the culmination of his "American first" economic policy, which has already shaken markets and started a trade war.

title: Not just Signal: 6 times Trump's security protocols raised eyebrows
shortDescription: Is the Signal security lapse part of a larger pattern under President Donald Trump? Experts say yes.

title: Trump says law firm struck $100 million deal. Others decide to sue
shortDescription: Law firms Jenner & Block and WilmerHale sued the Trump administration over executive orders targeting them, while another firm, Skadden, made a deal.

title: Wisconsin AG sues Elon Musk over payments to voters
shortDescription: Attorney General Josh Kaul took legal action against Elon Musk over the Trump ally's plans to award $1 million checks to two Wisconsin voters.

title: Judge blocks Trump from dismantling Consumer Finance Protection Bureau
shortDescription: Judge Amy Berman Jackson issued a preliminary injunction to stop Trump's administration from dismantling the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
